Differential Equations | Homogeneous System of Differential Equations Example 2

[imath]\mathbf{y}^{\prime}=\left(\begin{array}{cc}\n\mathbf{9} & \mathbf{2} \\\n-\mathbf{1} & -\mathbf{4}\n\end{array}\right) \mathbf{y}[/imath]\nusing the matrix exponential[imath]\mathbf{9} & \mathbf{2} [/imath] [imath]-\mathbf{1} & -\mathbf{4}[/imath]
